data.title: Shannon Rugby R.F.C.
data.meta_description: Join Shannon Rugby RFC. Your membership means so much to us. It allows us to provide you with the best experience available.
data.meta_site_name: Shannon Rugby R.F.C. - Alone it Stands
data.text:
We are using Sportlomo an online platform directly linked to the Munster Branch/IRFU for membership registration. This will provide you with the best options to pay your membership conveniently and efficiently. Follow the below link to visit out Sportlomo membership registration page to join or renew your membership. Also below you can see how on to save on your membership fee by joining the Shannon RFC Supporters Club.

If you sign up to the Shannon RFC Supporters Club draw at the same time as your membership you will:

Get a 20% Discount:

For an Adult Non-Playing membership this saves you €88, you pay €52 for membership & €300 for the Supporters club

For a Senior Citizen this saves you €70, you pay €0 for membership & €300 for the Supporters club

For a family membership this saves you €110, you pay €140 for membership & €300 for the Supporters club

Also you have an option to spread the cost over 10 months or just pay it up front which ever is convenient for you.

Join the SRFC Supporters Club and enter 4 Quarterly draws with 10 Prizes in each Draw including an opportunity to win Holiday Vouchers, Corporate November International Rugby Tickets, Weekend Holiday Breaks, Supermarket Vouchers, Category A Munster Rugby Heineken Cup tickets & hospitality plus many more prizes.

Become a fully paid-up member of Shannon RFC and Supporters Club today.
